Title: Enacts "Stella's law" requiring a CPR certified staff member to be present in school cafeterias during lunchtimes
Summary: Enacts "Stella's law"; requires a staff member certified in first aid, CPR, and the Heimlich maneuver to be present in school cafeterias during lunchtimes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a CPR certified staff member to be present in school cafeterias during lunchtimes
